content: Commercial buildings are referenced on the old site but to not have any dedicated analysis. That should go here. This section will probably encompass institutional buildings as well.

sections.name: Commercial Space Needs
content: An inventory of commecial space needs. Per person how much office space, retail, medical, etc. is needed?

sections.name: Commercial Buildings
content: Analysis of building form (low-rise, skyscraper, etc.) in terms of energy performance, land use, etc.
